attributes.action: Ignore the advisory result of the 2016 EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage has already confirmed that the £350 million a week will NOT but used fully for the NHS.
I believe we are stronger together in the EU.
I believe we are better in the union.
I believe all 16+ should have their opinion voiced, they are the generation which is affected most by this decision, yet the aging population has now decided their future is worthless.

Please sign this petition to show your support to ensure the younger generation, the UK and Europe prosper united.
attributes.background:
Please look to ignore the advisory result of the 2016 EU Referendum.
Firstly, the leave campaign has been riddled with false facts which has manipulated a high turnout of voters into leaving the EU.
Secondly, 16-17 year olds were NOT given their voice but were in the Scottish referendum.
